messages.body: $TSLA http://www.teslarati.com/first-model-3-spotted-in-europe-tesla-tilburg-netherlands-plant/

links.title: First Model 3 spotted in Europe near Tesla Netherlands plant
links.description: A black Model 3 was reportedly spotted near Tesla's assembly plant in the Netherlands, making it the first Model 3 seen by the European public. The photo comes by way of a tweet which shows a Model 3 on a rainy day near the factory in Tilburg.

More shady business practices at $TSLA.  http://www.autonews.com/article/20170908/OEM/170909790/tesla-referral-programs-draw-new-round-of-complaints-from-calif?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter

links.title: Tesla referral programs draw new round of complaints from Calif. dealers
links.description: California dealers expanded a complaint against Tesla Inc. over six new referral programs the automaker is offering customers. The California New Car Dealers Association sent a letter of complaint to the state's Department of Motor Vehicles citing Tesla's six latest referral programs and claiming they violate state law.

messages.body: $TSLA have a read on how unrealistic the model 3 pricing is for middle class lol... https://seekingalpha.com/article/4105496-tesla-faint-model-3-payment

links.title: Tesla: Don't Faint At The Model 3 Payment
links.description: If you do a Google search for "what is a mass market car?" the first 10 articles are Model 3 articles. Everyone in the press has picked up Elon Musk's claim that a $35,000 base priced Model 3 is a mass market car. In past articles, I have claimed otherwise.
